translations: 乳油，奶油；烈性甜酒（等于 creme）

sentences.sentence: Even Starbucks introduced its "antioxidant-rich" Blueberries & Crème Frappuccino.
sentences.translation: 就连星巴克咖啡也推出“富含抗氧化物”的蓝莓奶油星冰乐。

sentences.sentence: You are the crème de la crème of mamas.
sentences.translation: 你真是天底下最好的妈妈。
